text: Bradley Ernest Whitford (born February 23, 1952)Putterford, Mark (1991) The Fall and Rise of Aerosmith, Omnibus Press, Strong, Martin C. (2001) The Great Metal Discography (2nd edn.), MOJO Books, , p. 11-13 is an American rock musician. He is best known as the rhythm and co-lead guitarist for the hard rock band Aerosmith. He has also worked as a songwriter for the group, writing songs including "Last Child". ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Aerosmith members Category:American songwriters Category:American rock musicians Category:Musicians from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Massachusetts
